lines.i: "Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] volume with data type Physical Quantity
"Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25. "Indicates the volumetric unit associated with [Drug Strength Volume]." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-26.
Contains exactly one [1..1] productInstance, where its type is Medicinal Product Instance

Contains exactly one [1..1] volume with data type Physical Quantity
"Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25. "Indicates the volumetric unit associated with [Drug Strength Volume]." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-26.
Contains exactly one [1..1] productInstance, where its type is Medicinal Product Instance
